overview: Kelly Davis-Stoudt is responsible for iJETâ€™s financial strategy as well as legal, human resources and administration. She brings more than 15 years of financial leadership experience to iJET with expertise spanning all facets of corporate financial management, from compliance and credit management to international-subsidiary oversight and mergers and acquisitions. Prior to joining the iJET Leadership Team, Kelly served as acting CFO for Manugistics Group Inc., a global provider of supply chain management software solutions. Prior to her tenure at Manugistics, Kelly served as a senior accountant for Arthur Andersen LLP. She is a licensed CPA and a graduate of the University of Maryland.
